crazyballrun.game.utilities

Class GraphGenerator

  • java.lang.Object
    • crazyballrun.game.utilities.GraphGenerator

  • public class GraphGenerator
extends java.lang.Object
    The GraphGenerator generates a graph with neighborhood relations between QuadTree-leaf-nodes.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  GraphGenerator.Node
      Represents a QuadTree-leaf-node with neighborhood-information.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      GraphGenerator(QuadTree quadtree)
      Creates an instance of GraphGenerator.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void createLink(PathFinder.Node node1, PathFinder.Node node2)
      Creates a new neighborhood relation from node1 to node2 (NOT the other way around).
      PathFinder.Node getNode(long x, long y)
      Finds the node for a given position.
      java.util.LinkedList<PathFinder.Node> getNodes()
      Gets a reference to the list of nodes with neighborhood information.

      • createLink

        public void createLink(PathFinder.Node node1,
              PathFinder.Node node2)
        Creates a new neighborhood relation from node1 to node2 (NOT the other way around).
        Parameters:
        node1 - reference to the first node
        node2 - reference to the node which becomes neighbor of node1
